entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 2.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Prince Rupert Airport 7:54 PM PST Tuesday 07 February 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 2.9°C
Pressure: 100.6 kPa
Visibility: 3.2 km
Humidity: 97 %
Dewpoint: 2.5°C
Wind: SE 18 km/h gust 28 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few rain showers or wet flurries. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Rain showers and wet flurries. Rainfall amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 early this evening. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of rain showers or wet flurries. High plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers or wet flurries early in the morning. Rain beginning late in the afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h in the morning except gusting to 60 over exposed coastal sections late in the afternoon. High plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Rain. Temperature steady near plus 4.
entry.summary: Rain. Amount 30 mm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 increasing to 60 gusting to 80 except 90 gusting to 110 over exposed coastal sections late in the evening and overnight. Temperature steady near plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Tuesday 07 February 2023
